translation.en: [woman] People think dreams are an escape.
translation.ja: 人は“夢とは 避難場所で⸺”

translation.en: [woman] A chance to slip away from waking life to a world with no consequence.
translation.ja: “現(うつつ)の世界を離れ 気ままに 楽しむもの”と思っている

translation.en: -But that's not true. -[haunting choral music playing]
[woman] Your dreams don't just happen. We make them happen.
translation.ja: 私たちが夢を作り 見せているのだ

translation.en: And we design them with care just for you.
translation.ja: 一人ひとりに合わせた夢を

translation.en: We have our reasons, and we have our rules.
translation.ja: 夢を見せる理由も ルールもある

translation.en: We make your dreams to help you on your journey.
translation.ja: 人生という旅を 夢で助けているのだ

translation.en: And where this one's going, she's gonna need all the help she can get.
translation.ja: この子には この先 あらゆる助けが必要になる

translation.en: [exhales] Good morning, Pig.
-Morning, Bugsy. -[Bugsy squawks]
-[Dad grunting] -[girl] Hey, Dad. What'd you get?
[sighs] Many leagues have I traveled across the sea to bring you breakfast.
translation.ja: 海を渡り 朝食を買ってきた

translation.en: Oh. Thank you. Here. Here, let me help you with that.
translation.ja: ありがとう 待って　手伝う

translation.en: -Is that better? -Thank you.
-Yeah. -[Dad grunts]
-Hey, Bugsy! -[Bugsy squawks]
[Dad] All right.
Batter up.
And… batter up.
-[breeze blowing] -[Dad] We on course, kiddo?
[girl] The wind's come around.
translation.ja: 〝ワンダラー号〞 風が変わった

translation.en: So what're you gonna do?
Bow up.
-[tiller squeaks] -Bow up.
-[wrench straining] -A little more. Little more.
[Dad] Here ya go, kiddo.
His name is Fred.
Oh, hi, Fred.
And I've got Seymour.
Dad, why do I have to learn math if I'm gonna take care of the lighthouse, like you?
translation.ja: 私は灯台の守り人になるのに 算数が要る？

translation.en: I already know everything there is to know about the lighthouse anyway.
translation.ja: 灯台のことは すべて知ってる

translation.en: Answer me this question.
What is a lighthouse for?
To keep ships safe.
[Dad] No. That's not what it's for.
But when you can answer that question…
I'll give you the key to the lighthouse, and that's a promise.
-[girl gasps softly] -[Dad] Now, bed.
translation.ja: さあ もう寝なさい

translation.en: You don't want Pig?
[clicks tongue] I am 11.
Well, sorry, Pig. It's a rite of passage.
translation.ja: ピッグ　成長したらしい

translation.en: What's that?
Oh, no. No, you don't have to worry. I'll still be here for you.
translation.ja: 心配ない　俺がついてる

translation.en: All right. Well, good night.
Wait!
-[Dad] Hmm? -One story?
-Flip story? -[girl gasps excitedly]
All right.
I got one you never heard before.
As you know, Flip and I, we lived the outlaw life. Hmm?
translation.ja: フリップとパパは無法者で

translation.en: Hunting treasure every night, and… eh, what have you.
translation.ja: 毎晩 宝やら何やら あれこれ奪ってた

translation.en: Now, one day ol' Flippy comes up to me, and he says, "Guess what I've heard."
translation.ja: ある日 フリップが こう言った

translation.en: [quietly] He's heard about these Pearls. Magic Pearls. You get one of these Pearls, and you can wish for whatever you want.
translation.ja: “どんな願いでもかなう 魔法の真珠があるらしい”と

translation.en: The trouble was that these Pearls can only be found
translation.ja: だが その真珠があるのは

translation.en: in the most dangerous waters known to mankind.
translation.ja: 世界で一番危険な海なんだ

translation.en: -[eerie music playing] -The Sea of Nightmares.
Well, soon as I heard that, I was all, "Count me out. I don't want anything to do with it."
translation.ja: パパが“行く気はないぞ”と 言うと⸺

translation.en: Then, of course, Flip, you know him, he goes and he does… the Double-Knock.
translation.ja: ヤツは“ダブル･ノック” しやがった

translation.en: And when your partner does the Double-Knock--
-You can't refuse. -[Dad] That's right.
translation.ja: 断れない そう　無法者の掟(おきて)だ

translation.en: [both] Outlaw Code.
translation.ja: そう　無法者の掟(おきて)だ

translation.en: Set sail, we did.
Well, I tell you what, it was cold. It was mighty cold.
translation.ja: 海は凍える寒さだった

translation.en: But I was thinking, well, in that kind of climate, Flip might not smell so bad.
translation.ja: だがフリップのニオイが 気にならなくていい

translation.en: Then the storm came.
[softly] And the waves. -Suddenly there was this rumbling sound. -[thunder rumbles]
translation.ja: 大波の中 突然 うなるような音がした

translation.en: -It was all around us. -[floorboards creak]
-[Dad] And it grew louder by the second. -[wind picks up]
translation.ja: 音は次第に大きくなり⸺

translation.en: [Dad] It was the biggest, deadliest whirlpool I'd ever seen.
translation.ja: 船は大きな渦(うず)に巻き込まれた

translation.en: That boom swung around, hit me on the backside, and tossed me into that water.
translation.ja: 支柱が当たって パパは海に落ち⸺

translation.en: And down I went, like a lead weight.
Down… and down,
until I noticed there was a hole right there in the bottom of the sea.
translation.ja: すると驚いたことに 海の底に穴が開いてた

translation.en: So I swam in.
What's on the other side?
It's a dead place.
No life of any kind, just littered with bones of ancient sea creatures.
translation.ja: 命の気配は全くない あるのは昔の生物の骨だけ

translation.en: That's when it came for me.
The monster.
-It rose up out of the darkness. -[low growling]
[Dad] Black as night, and bigger than any creature I had ever seen.
translation.ja: 夜のように黒く ものすごく大きく⸺

translation.en: With long, smoky, inky tentacles. I was frozen in fear.
translation.ja: 煙のようにたなびく触手に パパは凍りついた

translation.en: And it just, kind of slowly…
translation.ja: その怪物は ゆっくりと⸺

translation.en: -[distorted] …slowly… -[monster snarls]
…reached out and grabbed me and shook me for all I was worth! And I take--
translation.ja: パパの体をつかんだ！ パパは…

translation.en: Stand by.
-[radio chatter continues] -Wait, you can't stop now.
What? You mean during the scary part?
-It wasn't scary. -[Dad] Mm-hmm.
It was a potentially interesting start to a story.
translation.ja: 面白くなりそうって思った

translation.en: -[Dad] Go for Peter. -Potentially… interesting start.
translation.ja: いい出だしだったから

translation.en: [Peter] Copy.
-[indistinct radio chatter] -[Peter] Nemo, listen to me. There's a fishing boat off Lopez that's in trouble. It's gonna get bad out there tonight.
translation.ja: ニモ　海が荒れて 釣り船が困ってるらしい

translation.en: Listen, you know what to do if the power goes out, right?
translation.ja: 停電したら どうする？

translation.en: Fire up the backup generator, clear the sump pump, radio Carla if there's a problem. [giggling] I got it, Dad.
translation.ja: 発電機を動かして ポンプで水を吐き出す

translation.en: Sweet dreams.
Hey… I got you.
translation.ja: さっき びっくりしただろ？

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Stop.
Good night.
[Peter] Good night. I'll be back soon.
[echoing] Dad?
Help! Help!
Help!
[frantically] Help!
Help!
Carla?
[Nemo] Carla, where's my dad?
Nemo,
he's gone, honey. He's gone.
translation.ja: お父さんは亡くなったわ

translation.en: [shakily] I'm sorry.
-[Nemo crying] -[Carla] Those were his wishes. Did he talk with you about any of this?
translation.ja: 彼の願いよ　聞いてない？

translation.en: Her mother died when she was a baby, so she's used to a single-parent household.
translation.ja: 母親は あの子が 赤ん坊の時に亡くなった

translation.en: She doesn't have anybody else.
It's you, or she becomes a ward of the state. They'll stick her in a group home or in foster…
translation.ja: あの子は 児童養護施設か里親に…

translation.en: Nemo, do you remember your uncle?
No. I've never met him before.
translation.ja: 知らない　会ったことない

translation.en: Your dad left instructions.
If anything ever happened to him…
he wanted you to go and stay with your uncle in the city.
translation.ja: 街の叔父さんの所へと

translation.en: But I have to take care of the lighthouse.
Nemo, you can't live alone.
translation.ja: ニモ　独りじゃ暮らせない

translation.en: But I can do it. I know how. He's taught me everything.
translation.ja: 灯台の仕事は 全部パパに教わった

translation.en: -[Carla] I'm sorry, honey. -[Nemo breathing shakily]
[man] "For tho' from out our bourne Of Time and Place The flood may bear me far"
translation.ja: “時と場所の限界を超え 洪水に押し流されても”

translation.en: "I hope to see my Pilot face to face When I have crost the bar"
translation.ja: “砂州を渡った暁には 自ら案内人に対面したい”

translation.en: [softly] That's him.
[quietly] Hello?
No, it's not a good time.
My uh… My brother was lost at sea.
Mm. No, lost lost. Like, I'm at his funeral.
translation.ja: 亡くなって 今 葬式の最中だ

translation.en: We were estranged, actually.
Estranged.
I'm… I'm happy with my plan.
translation.ja: だが これでいいんだ

translation.en: -Carla. -Hello.
Hello.
[sighs] I'm so sorry for your loss.
Our loss, obviously.
Um, we can… We better hit the road if we're gonna catch the ferry.
translation.ja: 行こうか フェリーに乗り遅れる

translation.en: -[horn honks] -Uh, no shoes on the carpet.
-Oh, I'm sorry. -No…
It's a great building. You never have to leave. [chuckles]
translation.ja: いい所だろ？ 何でもそろってる

translation.en: Which I basically never do 'cause I work from home.
translation.ja: 僕は家で仕事してるんだ

translation.en: Sorry.
There's a dry cleaner's, a coffee shop.
translation.ja: クリーニング店や カフェもある

translation.en: They even have a, um… a spinning studio downstairs.
translation.ja: エアロバイク(スピニング)･スタジオもね

translation.en: Are you into spinning?
Like spinning around?
I don't know. I… I've never tried it.
Hey… [spluttering]
Do you like doorknobs?
These are my babies.
translation.ja: 僕の子供のような存在だ

translation.en: You're a doorknob salesman?
[scoffs] I'm not… I'm not a doorknob salesman.
translation.ja: セールスマンじゃない

translation.en: I own a company that sells doorknobs.
translation.ja: ドアノブの会社の社長だ

translation.en: We sell latches. We sell escutcheons.
Here's where we differ.
A lot of the glamour boys in the industry, they chase the latest trends, not us.
translation.ja: 流行を追う会社もあるが うちは違う

translation.en: No, thank you. We'll stick with the classics. 'Cause it's security. It's not fashion.
translation.ja: ドアに大切なのは 見た目より安全性…

translation.en: -Don't touch that. -Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
That's not a toy.
This is an antique.
translation.ja: これが使われてたのは⸺

translation.en: Came from a prison cell in Alcatraz.
translation.ja: アルカトラズ島の刑務所だ

translation.en: In case I need to lock you in your room. [chuckles]
I-- I-- I'm not gonna lock you in your room.
That was… humor.
[splutters] Do you need a hug or whatever?
No.
Well, good night.
[Nemo, softly] I know, Pig. I wish we could be with him again too.
translation.ja: ピッグ　私もパパが恋しい

translation.en: Pig.
-What? -[Pig oinks]
Wait!
-[Pig grunts, squeals] -No.
[Nemo] Don't! Stop, stop! Wait!
Stop! Pause. Pause. Pause. Pause.
translation.ja: ストップ　止まってよ

translation.en: No! No, no, no! No! [gasps]
Stop! Stop! No, no, no, no, no! No! No!
[Nemo] Red light. Stop!
translation.ja: 赤信号だよ　止まって

translation.en: -[tapping] Red light! -[Pig oinks]
-Come on, Pig. -[Pig squealing]
-[taps] Thanks. -[Pig grunts]
-[Nemo] Hi, Bugsy. -[Bugsy caws]
Dad?
-[loud thumping upstairs] -Dad?
Dad?
Who are you?
Nobody? [laughs nervously]
I'm just one of those weird things that happens in dreams.
translation.ja: 誰でもない 夢に出てくる変なヤツさ

translation.en: Ignore me. I'm leaving now.
[man, high-pitched] Come back later. We're doin' dishes.
[gruffly] 'Kay, so that didn't work.
So, you're the kid.
What are you doing here?
And where's my dad?
[scoffs] Nobody told you?
I know what happened.
[sighs, grunts] Well, your dad and I were partners a long time ago,
translation.ja: 俺たちは相棒だったが

translation.en: before he went straight and had a kid. Big mistake, in my opinion. [chuckles slightly, sighs deeply]
translation.ja: お前が生まれ ヤツは冒険をやめた

translation.en: [snarling] Mad, bad, and dangerous to know.
Named Flip.
-You're Flip? -[grunts softly] Yeah.
I thought you were something my dad made up,
and you're different than I imagined.
Handsomer? More "gorgeous-er," if you will?
translation.ja: 思ってたより 男前でゴージャスだろ？

translation.en: Hairier. -And… [sniffs] …smellier. -[Flip] Hmm.
translation.ja: 毛むくじゃら　それに臭い

translation.en: I mean, I know you're not real, but I always pictured, like, a normal human being.
translation.ja: 実在しないにしても もう少し普通っぽいかと

translation.en: Okay, you just said like four insulting things on top of each other. Rude.
translation.ja: 失礼なことばっかり 言いやがって

translation.en: -Listen, I just came to pay my respects. -[fly buzzes, splats] [chewing] Sorry for your loss. Hi-yah!
translation.ja: オヤジさんの死が悲しくて 来たんだ

translation.en: By ripping my dad's room apart?
Oh, that reminds me…
[chuckling] …your dad, he had a map.
About this big. Weird shapes and lines all over it.
translation.ja: これくらいで 変な形や線だらけで⸺

translation.en: Picture with an oyster with a pearl on the back of it.
It's one-of-a-kind, kid. We risked our lives stealing it.
translation.ja: 命がけで盗んだ地図なんだ

translation.en: -I never saw any map like that. -[Flip] Don't lie to me, kid!
translation.ja: 知らない ウソつくな！

translation.en: Your dad would want me to have it.
I'm not lying.
Never mind, I'll find it myself. [blows a raspberry]
Hey, you can't just bust in here like some kind of thief.
translation.ja: 勝手に家に入るなんて 泥棒みたい

translation.en: -You say thief like it's a bad thing. -[glass shatters]
A thief just takes things that don't belong to them.
You can't take things from other people's dreams.
translation.ja: 人の夢からは奪えない

translation.en: [scoffs] Sure you can. Ya just gotta know how to get in and get out. I'm in your dream.
translation.ja: 俺は夢に出入りできるから 今 ここにいるんだ

translation.en: You're just a figment of my imagination.
translation.ja: 私が想像したからだよ

translation.en: You wish you could dream up somethin' this good. Look at that.
translation.ja: 俺を想像で生み出した？

translation.en: Mm! I look good.
Please! I don't want you here. I just want my dad.
translation.ja: もう出てって パパに会いたいの

translation.en: [smacks lips] Okay.
What if there is a way you can see your dad again?
translation.ja: オヤジさんに 会う方法があったら？

translation.en: What do you mean?
I'm goin' on a little treasure hunt, and this treasure… is magic.
translation.ja: 宝探しに行かないか？ 願いがかなう宝があるんだ スランバーランドにな

translation.en: Lets you wish for whatever you want here in Slumberland.
translation.ja: 願いがかなう宝があるんだ スランバーランドにな

translation.en: I could see my dad again.
Oh, yeah, you can see your dad again. Right here, every night.
translation.ja: もちろんだ　会えるとも 夢の中で毎晩

translation.en: But I'm gonna need that map, kid.
-[tense music playing] -I don't know what you're talking about.
[sucks teeth] Yeah, I believe you.
Hey, wait! I can try to find the map. I can still come with you.
translation.ja: 待って　私も一緒に行く

translation.en: Oh, that sounds super fun.
Except you got no gear, no skills,
and without the map… oh, you're useless to me.
translation.ja: 地図がなきゃ役に立たん

translation.en: -[Nemo gasps] -Time to wake up, kid.
A map.
Oh, you're up already. Good.
What are you doin'?
What's the weirdest dream you've ever had?
I don't remember my dreams. Don't actually think I have any.
translation.ja: 夢は覚えてないな 見てない気がする

translation.en: I brought you some milk, right?
translation.ja: 牛乳を持ってきた　どうぞ

translation.en: Are you, uh, excited for your first day of school?
translation.ja: 学校に行くのは楽しみか？

translation.en: School?
[Uncle] This place should be amazing. It costs a fortune.
translation.ja: いい学校だぞ　学費も高い

translation.en: My dad said schools are basically prisons. They keep kids locked up physically and mentally,
translation.ja: パパが“学校は牢屋みたいに 子供を閉じ込めて⸺”

translation.en: prepare them for jobs that are also basically prisons, until they retire and go to a nursing home. Their final prison.
translation.ja: “牢屋みたいな社会の 準備をさせる場所だ”って

translation.en: School is not a prison.
Can I leave whenever I want to?
It's a little like a prison.
Bell doesn't help.
Nemo, hi. Welcome to Westbrook.
translation.ja: ニモ　わが校へようこそ

translation.en: -I am Ms. Arya, lower school counselor. -Hey. Hi.
translation.ja: 私はアーヤ スクールカウンセラーよ

translation.en: Well, I know what a… a difficult time this is but, um…
translation.ja: いろいろ大変だと思うけど…

translation.en: Hey, do you know what the most resilient thing on earth is? It's not titanium.
translation.ja: 一番 強いものは？ チタンじゃない

translation.en: Is it tungsten? It has a higher tensile strength--
translation.ja: タングステン？　強度や…

translation.en: The human spirit.
Oh, you mean metaphorically.
What you're going through, it's hard. But you know what?
translation.ja: つらいわよね でも あなたは強い子よ

translation.en: You are stronger than you know.
translation.ja: でも あなたは強い子よ

translation.en: Hey, can we talk for a sec?
-Oh, yeah. -Just one sec. Uh…
I, uh, just wanted to prepare you.
[quietly] Nemo's dad kinda raised her like a hermit.
translation.ja: ニモは世間から 隔離されてきた

translation.en: Not in a bad way, just… you have your work cut out for you.
translation.ja: いい子だが 君は苦労すると思う

translation.en: She… She's gonna need a lot of emotional support.
Yeah. I mean, I'm hoping that you guys can help with all that.
translation.ja: そうなんだ 助けてやってほしい

translation.en: Oh. Well, we can't do that all by ourselves.
-No. -[both chuckle]
-Right? -Right. Obviously.
translation.ja: でしょ？ だが それが君の仕事では？

translation.en: Is that not something you do?
translation.ja: だが それが君の仕事では？

translation.en: Look, I don't know how to take care of a little kid or talk about feelings.
translation.ja: 子供と どう話すのかも 分からない

translation.en: Now, I think that she would be better off literally anywhere else.
translation.ja: 君のほうが うまくやれる

translation.en: [softly] Okay.
Oh, you have my hands.
You are capable of more than you think.
translation.ja: あなたなら できるわ

translation.en: -[chuckles] Truly. You just gotta… -[chuckles lightly]
translation.ja: 本当に 心の奥で眠ってる力を 引き出せばいいだけ

translation.en: You just gotta connect with a part of yourself that you're not used to accessing. Right.
translation.ja: 心の奥で眠ってる力を 引き出せばいいだけ

translation.en: You just gotta connect with her. -Just try. -Okay.
translation.ja: あの子と向き合う努力をして

translation.en: -[door opens] -Hi, everyone. Hi.
[quietly] Thanks, Ms. Young.
Hi, guys. How's everybody doing?
translation.ja: みんな 元気かしら？

translation.en: This is Nemo. She's gonna be joining your class.
translation.ja: この子はニモ 新しい お友達よ

translation.en: So if you could all just make her feel right at home, I would be so grateful.
translation.ja: 歓迎してくれたら 私もうれしい

translation.en: Sorry.
Okay, everyone. Listen up.
In a victory for planet Earth, we got compostable utensils in the cafeteria.
translation.ja: カフェテリアで 土に返る食器が採用された

translation.en: We won!
Hmm. Uh, Nemo, Jamal.
translation.ja: ニモ　ジャマールよ

translation.en: -Jamal, Nemo. -[Jamal] It's a seven-day cycle.
translation.ja: ニモ　ジャマールよ 遅刻すると⸺

translation.en: You're late, you get a blue dot.
Three blues, and you get a red dot, and your parents get a notification.
translation.ja: 青３つで赤丸　親に連絡が

translation.en: And you can get the app for your phone.
I don't have a phone.
That is refreshing.
You're gonna need the app, though. Any clubs you're into?
translation.ja: でもアプリは要るよ クラブは？

translation.en: I'm on recycling team, Model UN, ceramics club, Pop-Tarts, that's our improv group,
translation.ja: 僕はリサイクルと模擬国連 陶芸 即興演奏

translation.en: lawn bowling, Slavic chorus, orchestra, woodworking, ultimate Frisbee…
translation.ja: ローンボウリング　コーラス オーケストラ　木工

translation.en: Where'd you go to school before this?
I didn't. I was homeschooled.
Um, my dad and I lived in a lighthouse.
A lighthouse? That sounds awesome.
Why'd you move here?
My…
My dad's on a trip. That's why I'm here. I'm staying with my uncle, just temporarily.
translation.ja: パパが旅行中で 叔父さんに預けられた

translation.en: Oh. Cool.
Those are my Undeadheads. We dress up as zombies and watch zombie movies.
translation.ja: 彼らはゾンビの格好で ゾンビ映画を見る仲間

translation.en: It's cooler than it sounds… I think.
translation.ja: 君が思うより楽しいよ

translation.en: Uh, come sit with us.
Um, I… I need to do my math.
[Jamal] Okay.
I have a great activity we can do together.
translation.ja: 一緒に遊べる物を用意した

translation.en: Lockpicks.
Probably from some master thief. Or maybe just a retiring locksmith.
translation.ja: 前の持ち主は大泥棒か 鍵職人だな

translation.en: That cool?
I first learned to do this when I was about your age.
translation.ja: 君くらいの時 やり方を覚えた

translation.en: I was the first kid in school interested in door hardware.
translation.ja: ドアに興味を持った生徒は 僕が初めて

translation.en: [Uncle] Now, the trick… is to move both slowly.
translation.ja: コツは両方を ゆっくり動かすこと

translation.en: Feel for the catch.
Before you know it…
Houdini who? Houdini me. That's Houdini who.
translation.ja: “フーディーニは誰？ あら不思議”

translation.en: That's a little… mantra. You don't have to say that.
translation.ja: いわば呪文だよ 言わなくてもいいけど

translation.en: Wanna have a go?
I'm a little doorknobbed out.
That's fine. We can, um… [clicks tongue] We'll do something else. We'll, uh…
translation.ja: そうか　だったら 他のことをすればいい

translation.en: play soccer.
We could play soccer. Wanna… uh, build a pillow fort?
translation.ja: サッカーとか 枕で要塞を作るとか？

translation.en: Are you reading a list off your phone?
-Yes. Yes, I am. -[phone locks]
I'm gonna just…
Oh, sure. Totally.
Pig?
Pig, what are you doing?
[Nemo] Oh my gosh, Pig.
You found it.
Come on, Pig. Let's go find Dad.
translation.ja: 〝装備･･食料 懐中電灯 ひも 退屈な本〞 パパを捜そう

translation.en: Boring book, boring book, boring…
See ya.
Um, I have to check my schedule. Can I see your phone?
translation.ja: 予定をスマホで見たい

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
[Uncle] Look at you, using apps. See what happens when you try?
translation.ja: 〝欠席届〞 アプリを 使えるようになったのか アプリを 使えるようになったのか アプリを 使えるようになったのか 〝２週間 欠席〞 〝２週間 欠席〞

translation.en: [Nemo] Yup, just learnin' new stuff all the time.
translation.ja: 〝２週間 欠席〞 いろいろ覚えてるよ いろいろ覚えてるよ

translation.en: [Nemo] Oh, Flip.
Come on, Pig.
[echoing] Flip?
Flip?
-[metal clanging] -[Flip laughing]
-[Nemo] Flip! -[tool clatters]
[Flip] You.
I found the map.
I knew I liked you. [chuckles]
-You tried to kill me. -I was trying to wake you up.
translation.ja: 私を殺そうと 起こしたんだ 夢では死なない

translation.en: Everybody knows you can't die in your dreams.
translation.ja: 起こしたんだ 夢では死なない

translation.en: You told me about this in my dream, and then I find it in the Waking World. How is that possible?
translation.ja: 夢で聞いた地図が 現の世界にあるなんて変だよ

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Maybe the real world's bigger than you thought.
[Nemo] Hey! It's my map. You can't just take it.
Yeah, well, I hate to break it to you, kid. Taking people's stuff's kind of my thing.
translation.ja: 悪いね 奪うのが俺の趣味なんだ

translation.en: -[Flip gasps] -You said I could see my dad again. I'm coming with you.
translation.ja: パパに会いたい　一緒に行く

translation.en: Listen, that's real sweet and all, and I miss your dad too,
translation.ja: 気持ちは分かるが お断りだ

translation.en: but you're not comin'! Go away.
translation.ja: 気持ちは分かるが お断りだ うせろ

translation.en: What was that?
Double-Knock.
He told you about the Double-Knock?
You have to take me. Outlaw Code.
translation.ja: 掟で もう断れない

translation.en: Oh, don't tell me about the Outlaw Code.
I'm one of the cocreators of the Outlaw Code. Before me, it was just one knock.
translation.ja: この掟は 俺も一緒に作ったんだ

translation.en: This isn't some Girl Scout trip to Lollipop Land, okay?
translation.ja: ガールスカウトの 遠足じゃねえ

translation.en: We're gonna have to travel through people's dreams to get to that treasure.
So you get killed, it's on you.
You said you can't die in a dream.
I said you can't die in your dream. You die in your dream, you wake up. You die in someone else's dream, you don't wake up. Ever.
translation.ja: 自分の夢ではな 人の夢で死んだら目覚めない

translation.en: I don't care. I'm coming.
translation.ja: それでもいい　行く

translation.en: Fine.
You slow me down, you screw things up, this map is mine, and you're on your own.
translation.ja: 足手まといになったら 地図をもらうぞ

translation.en: -Deal. -Let me see your gear.
[under breath] Double-Knock.
What is this? Extraordinary Knobs.
translation.ja: これは何だ “すごいドアノブ”？

translation.en: It's my Uncle Philip's. He's a doorknob salesman. He has no friends, no life, and he makes me go to school.
translation.ja: フィリップ叔父さんの本 私に“学校へ行け”って

translation.en: What a monster.
Well, this'll put you to sleep faster than any sleeping pill.
translation.ja: この本なら すぐ眠れるな

translation.en: Okay, here. You hold on to this when you fall asleep.
translation.ja: 眠る時は これを持つんだ

translation.en: That way, you can find me when we're on the road. Okay?
translation.ja: 互いを見つける目印だ

translation.en: -[Pig burps] -What the heck is that?
[Nemo] He's a pig, and his name is Pig.
Super creative. Fine. Bring him. I love bacon.
translation.ja: そうか　ベーコンは好きだ

translation.en: All right. Look at this.
The World of Dreams.
This is a map of every dream in the world. Slumberland.
translation.ja: 夢が集まる場所 スランバーランドの地図だ

translation.en: Your dad and I used this map to go on all our adventures back in the day,
translation.ja: オヤジさんと俺は これを使い⸺

translation.en: jumpin' from dream to dream, to wherever we wanted to go.
translation.ja: 夢から夢へと渡り歩いた

translation.en: We swiped this map from a dream cop at the Bureau. She's been chasing me ever since.
translation.ja: これを局から盗んだから お尋ね者なのさ

translation.en: The Bureau?
Bureau of Subconscious Activities, BOSA.
Unfortunately for us, they're the bozos that decide what you get to dream.
translation.ja: 夢の内容は ヤツらが決めるんだが

translation.en: Unless you end up here.
-The Sea of Nightmares. -[thunder crashing]
Sea of Nightmares. My dad told me about that.
translation.ja: 悪夢の海？　パパに聞いた

translation.en: That's where the Pearls are.
[Flip] Greatest treasure in the world.
The sticky part is those dream cops at the Bureau don't want us to know they even exist.
translation.ja: だがドリーム･コップは その存在を隠してる

translation.en: Because you get your hands on one of those bad boys, and you can wish for whatever you want here in Slumberland. And it's out of their control.
translation.ja: 真珠がかなえる願いには ヤツらも手を出せないからだ

translation.en: I could see my dad again?
If you don't die. Which you probably will. Oh my God. Your dad would kill me if he knew I was doing this.
translation.ja: その前に死ぬさ 俺 オヤジさんに怒られるな

translation.en: All right, listen, we're looking for reoccurring dreams. That way, we can get out the same way that we got in.
translation.ja: 人が繰り返し見る夢を探し そこから出入りする

translation.en: Where's the door?
What door?
[sighs] The Bureau puts in secret doors to connect the dreams.
translation.ja: 夢と夢をつなぐドアだ

translation.en: Civilians aren't supposed to know, unless you're a genius like myself. Hi-yah!
translation.ja: 俺は天才だから 存在を知ってる

translation.en: [martial arts shout] Look out!
Okay, that was definitely not here before.
translation.ja: 前は こんなドアなかった

translation.en: All right, we go through this door, everything changes.
translation.ja: ここから先は別世界だ

translation.en: You slip up, you're dead. You'll never see the Waking World again.
translation.ja: ヘマして死んだら 二度と目が覚めない

translation.en: Okay. [takes a deep breath]
What are we waiting for?
That's the spirit.
All right. Welcome to my world, kid.
translation.ja: よし　俺の世界へようこそ

translation.en: Brand-new dream, still under construction.
Elegante.
Spanish for "I look good."
I'm a flippin' outlaw, so I don't play by the rules. But here's the rules.
translation.ja: 無法者の俺から お前にルールを教える

translation.en: Rule number one, keep a low profile.
We don't wanna get caught messin' around in other people's dreams, trust me.
translation.ja: 人の夢にいるところを⸺

translation.en: -If the dream pigs catch you, they will-- -[Pig grunts]
translation.ja: 警察(ピッグ)に見つかったら…

translation.en: Oh. My bad, buddy.
translation.ja: 傷ついたか　ごめん

translation.en: If the dream cops catch you, they will lock you up and throw away the key.
translation.ja: ドリーム･コップに 見つかったら⸺

translation.en: Doomed to rot in a dingy Bureau prison cell for all of eternity till you cease to exist entirely.
translation.ja: 局の牢屋に閉じ込められ 永遠に出られない

translation.en: So blend in.
Yeah, 'cause you totally blend in.
Rule number two, stay focused.
[whistles] We're not here to have fun, okay? We get in, we find the next door, then we get out.
translation.ja: 遊んでるヒマはないぞ 次のドアを探せ

translation.en: Onto the next dream. Our one and only mission is finding those Pearls.
translation.ja: 目的は真珠を見つけることだ

translation.en: Rule number three. We're not friends. We're not partners.
translation.ja: それから“友達面をするな”

translation.en: I am the boss. El Jefe, 'kay? We do as I say, you got it?
translation.ja: 俺はエル･ヘフェ つまりボスだ　従え

translation.en: So rule number three's just a bunch of aggressive statements?
Nobody likes a smart aleck, kid.
-[in Spanish] Excuse me. -[Flip] Hey, buddy. What's up?
translation.ja: 〈失礼〉 〈よう　調子はどうだ〉

translation.en: Are you sure you're in the right dream?
translation.ja: 〈この夢の 登場人物ですか？〉

translation.en: I don't see you on my list.
The girl represents long-lost childhood.
I'm a troubling mix of a father figure
and raw, masculine power.
And… what is this?
Brother…
[in English, with Spanish accent] …sometimes a pig is just a pig.
translation.ja: ブタは ただのブタだ

translation.en: Silly puerco.
Yes.
[in Spanish] Library.
[clears throat] Perdón.
Do you party?
No, I don't.
You party. I party.
translation.ja: 〈好きだろ　俺も大好きだ〉

translation.en: -Gracias. -Okay.
[in English] What was that?
I don't know Spanish. That's the only word I know.
Leave it to the pros. That's me. That's professional.
Ooh, it's all about the Miss D, misdirection. Did you know that? Boop!
translation.ja: 気をそらす作戦も このとおり成功した

translation.en: I don't even know if this is real. Oh, that's real.
Now we're talkin'. [laughs]
Who wants the Waking World when you got all this, huh?
[Green] Oi! Agent Green.
translation.ja: 潜在意識活性局の エージェント･グリーンよ

translation.en: Bureau of Subconscious Activities. This the thieving punk you rang about?
translation.ja: 潜在意識活性局の エージェント･グリーンよ この男を見たのね？

translation.en: [Green] Cheers, mate.
Our next door
is behind the stage, yeah. [chuckles]
[band leader, in Spanish] And now, the Salsa Queen of Old Havana!
translation.ja: 〈オールド･ハバナの サルサの女王です！〉

translation.en: [in English] There's our dreamer.
-[laughs] Classic repression dream. -[Nemo] What's that?
Well, you never heard of Freud? [in singsong] Repression.
All those feelings get bottled up, and they go busting out in Slumberland.
translation.ja: 抑圧した感情が スランバーランドで爆発する

translation.en: I guarantee she's nothin' like that in the Waking World. Believe me.
translation.ja: 現の世界では まるで別人のはず

translation.en: [in Spanish accent] You see me? Yes.
translation.ja: 俺が見えるのか　よし

translation.en: [in Spanish] Mm! What is that scent?
[in English] It's au naturel. By Flip.
[sighs, in Spanish] Such raw, masculine power.
But at the same time… a deep sadness.
translation.ja: 〈でも同時に 悲しんでる雰囲気がある〉

translation.en: Like a lost little boy, far from home.
[sighs] Dance with me.
[in English] Hey! You said we weren't here to have fun.
I said you're not here to have fun. I'm an outlaw.
translation.ja: お前はな　俺は無法者だ

translation.en: If I'm not havin' fun, I'm doin' my job wrong.
[in Spanish] Who's she?
Go away, Nemo. You'll ruin the nice lady's dream. -Buh-bye. -[Nemo grunts]
translation.ja: 下がってろ 美女の夢の邪魔だ

translation.en: -[wings flapping loudly] -Flip!
-[music grows sinister] -[Nemo] What about the Pearls?
[Nemo, whimpering] Flip!
[panting] Flip? Please!
[Flip] What the Flip?
That's no bueno.
Adiós. Let's get to that door, fast.
translation.ja: アディオス　行くぞ

translation.en: Hello, Flip. Where's that map?
[snarls] Green.
I've been waiting for this for a long time.
translation.ja: この瞬間を長年 待ってた

translation.en: The dream cop.
You're under a--
translation.ja: あんたを これから…

translation.en: [shakily] What… the…?
"What the…?" [chuckles]
[Flip] Nightmare!
Look out!
[grunting and straining] Oh my God!
Ew, yucky!
-[music fades] -[Flip] Holy moly.
It took years for me to shake that cop off my tuchus.
translation.ja: 何年もかけて グリーンをまいたのに⸺

translation.en: First dream out with you, I get her and a nightmare?
translation.ja: 突然 彼女や悪夢が現れた

translation.en: You're like a bad luck charm.
And I don't get it. That nightmare flew right past the dreamer.
translation.ja: 悪夢は夢の主を 素通りして⸺

translation.en: [sighs] Why the heck was it coming after us?
I've seen it before.
The night my dad died.
It's yours. It's your nightmare.
translation.ja: つまり お前の悪夢なのか

translation.en: What?
You brought the nightmare. Nightmares smell fear.
translation.ja: 悪夢は恐怖をかぎつける

translation.en: It's tracking you, and nightmares won't stop until they get you.
translation.ja: この先 どこまでも 追ってくるぞ

translation.en: [panting] Do you ruin every party you go to?
I've never even been to a party.
I never should've brought you. Give me the map back.
No. I did the Double-Knock.
Give it to me!
[Flip] What is that?
No, no, no. Don't-- Don't wake up! Don't wake up! No, give me… give me the map!
translation.ja: ダメだ　目覚めるな 先に地図を渡せ

translation.en: -Hey. -Uh, what are you doing here?
Checking my mushrooms.
Mushroom club. It's a… one-person club.
translation.ja: キノコ部なんだ　部員は１人

translation.en: Are you hiding out down here?
No.
'Cause I mean, you weren't in class, and this looks a little bit like a secret hideout, so…
translation.ja: 教室にいなかったし ここは隠れ家って感じ

translation.en: School thinks I'm on a trip, and my uncle thinks I'm at school.
translation.ja: 叔父さんに内緒で 欠席届を出した

translation.en: Hardcore.
Uh, you won't tell anybody I'm here, though, right?
Omertà, the vow of silence.
You can try some of my mushrooms.
Just brush 'em off first. It's manure. It's not my poop, so it isn't weird or anything.
translation.ja: 肥料は たい肥 僕のウンチじゃない

translation.en: Bye.
See ya. [sighs]
…squirt. [chuckles]
Can I take the… I wanna show you something really cool.
You ready?
And… surprise.
I arranged with Carla to get it here, and I figured maybe this Saturday we could go sailing.
translation.ja: カーラに頼んだんだ 土曜日 セーリングに出よう

translation.en: I mean, you could go sailing.
translation.ja: いや 君が出るといい 僕は陸に残る

translation.en: I'm strictly a dry-land guy due to my sensitive bowels.
translation.ja: いや 君が出るといい 僕は陸に残る 〝ワンダラー号〞 おなかが弱くてね

translation.en: You should sell it or something.
I don't think I wanna sail anymore.
[Philip] Nemo, I know this is hard. And different and scary.
translation.ja: つらいよな 環境も変わったし不安だろ

translation.en: But I think it would be a mistake if you shut yourself off from the world, like your dad did.
translation.ja: でも 君のパパのように 心を閉ざしちゃダメだ

translation.en: What are you talking about?
Your dad was… different before.
And then, when your mom died--
My dad wasn't shut off.
[scoffs] Nemo, he moved to an island.
Do you ever go anywhere or do anything? Do you have any actual friends? Doorknobs don't count.
translation.ja: 叔父さんこそ ドアノブ以外に友達はいる？

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm just saying, don't be afraid to… I don't know, have fun again.
translation.ja: 僕は ただ 楽しむことを怖がるなと

translation.en: I'm not afraid of anything.
-I'm gonna go to bed. -[mouthing] What?
It's like 5:30.
I know you wanna sleep all the time because you're sad. I know that feeling.
translation.ja: 悲しくて 夢に 逃げたい気持ちは分かるが

translation.en: But life is what happens when you're awake.
Not mine!
[whining] Go to sleep. Go to sleep. Go to sleep.
translation.ja: 眠るの　眠るの　眠るの

translation.en: -Damn it. This is interesting! -[book thuds]
translation.ja: もう　これ面白すぎ！

translation.en: You okay?
I just wanna sleep.
Maybe if you tried putting on some pajamas.
This is what I wear to bed.
Okay, well, what did your dad do to help you get to sleep?
translation.ja: そうか　パパは寝る時 何をしてくれた？

translation.en: Sometimes… he'd tell me stories.
Aren't you a little old for that?
-Never mind. -[Philip] No, it's fine.
translation.ja: 忘れて いいよ　やってみよう

translation.en: I can try to make up a story.
translation.ja: いいよ　やってみよう お話を⸺ 作ってみる

translation.en: Okay. Sorry, I didn't realize you were gonna be watching me. That's… That's fine.
translation.ja: じっと見られると 思わなかった

translation.en: This is a story based on a true story
about a man…
on Christmas Eve…
I think. Who took delivery of 30,000 porcelain doorknobs
translation.ja: ある男が磁器のドアノブを ３万個 受け取った

translation.en: from a supplier in France,
translation.ja: フランスの業者からな

translation.en: but instead of being three inches in diameter,
translation.ja: だが直径が 7.5センチではなく⸺

translation.en: these knobs were three centimeters. [chuckles]
Try fitting a metric doorknob onto a standard escutcheon.
translation.ja: これじゃ 普通のドアに使えない

translation.en: -What to do? -[gentle music playing]
You would need a Christmas miracle.
translation.ja: クリスマスの奇跡が必要だ

translation.en: But then our hero realized
translation.ja: その時 ヒーローは気づいた

translation.en: that these little knobs were the perfect size
translation.ja: この小さなドアノブは⸺

translation.en: for standard cabinet drawer pulls.
translation.ja: タンスの取っ手に ぴったりだとね

translation.en: You must be exhausted. That was the exciting part.
translation.ja: いいところなのに寝たのか

translation.en: [kisses] Good night, Nemo.
Flip.
Well.
You came back.
[grunts] I'm impressed.
-I'm proud of you. -Really?
Nah. Go away. Go home.
translation.ja: なんてな うせろ　家に帰れ

translation.en: I don't have a home. Without that Pearl, I don't have anything.
translation.ja: 家はないの　真珠を探したい

translation.en: You don't get it, kid. Nightmares smell fear. And you, you're scared.
translation.ja: 悪夢は恐怖を追い お前は怖がってる

translation.en: I'm not scared.
I mean it. [growls]
Just take your feelings, crumple 'em up in a little ball, and shove 'em down deep.
translation.ja: 一緒に来るなら 感情をのみ込むんだ

translation.en: 'Cause I'm not doin' this for you. I'm doin' it for your dad.
translation.ja: オヤジさんのために妥協する

translation.en: Same.
Yeah? Yeah, double same.
translation.ja: そうか　それは結構

translation.en: -[Nemo] Pig! -[Pig oinks]
[Flip] No. No pigs. Get outta here.
-[Nemo] Come on, Pig. -[Pig snorting]
So, who are you in the Waking World? Or… what are you?
translation.ja: あなた 現の世界では誰？ 何してる人？

translation.en: Don't remember, don't care. [sighs] Haven't woken up for a long time.
translation.ja: 覚えてない ずっと眠ってるんだ

translation.en: Well, I mean, you kinda have to wake up. Everybody wakes up.
translation.ja: でも誰だって 起きなきゃいけないでしょ

translation.en: Not me.
After your dad quit the game before he had you, I just kept goin', y'know?
translation.ja: オヤジさん抜きで 冒険を続けてる

translation.en: Door after door, dream after dream.
translation.ja: ドアからドア　夢から夢

translation.en: Then I realized… [laughing] …I don't have to wake up.
translation.ja: 目覚めなくてもいいと 気づいたら⸺

translation.en: You know, after a while, you sort of forget about the small details, like, uh,
translation.ja: 細かい記憶が だんだん消えていった

translation.en: y'know, who I am.
Anyhoo, when I get that Pearl, I'll have everything that I want.
translation.ja: とにかく真珠を手に入れれば 願いがかなう

translation.en: What are you gonna wish for?
[Flip] No more Agent Green would be nice.
All I want is my dad.
If I could see him, I don't really care what happens in the Waking World.
translation.ja: パパに会えるなら どうなってもいい

translation.en: -Yeah, I miss your dad too. -[Pig sighs]
So, he told you all about me, huh?
translation.ja: オヤジさんは俺の話を？

translation.en: -Every night. -Yeah, man.
translation.ja: 毎晩ね いい相棒だった

translation.en: We were a heck of a team.
Goin' wherever we wanted, takin' whatever we wanted.
translation.ja: 気の向くまま あれこれ奪って⸺

translation.en: We were tippy-top of the Bureau's most wanted list.
translation.ja: お尋ね者リスト１位だった

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, man.
Now I think I'm down to 13, but… I'm bouncin' back.
translation.ja: 今じゃ13位だ だが すぐ返り咲く

translation.en: I can feel it. [sniffs]
translation.ja: だが すぐ返り咲く

translation.en: Anyways… [sighs, groans]
…I just can't get a bead on this next door. It keeps movin'.
translation.ja: 次のドアを探さないと 進めない

translation.en: Oh man.
The door is in the truck. Shh.
translation.ja: ドアは あのトラックの中だ

translation.en: -[Flip] Cool. Cool. -[Nemo] Cool. Cool. Cool.
-[sighs] Yeah, right? -[Nemo] Mm-hmm.
You party?
-Yeah, you party. -[Nemo] Yeah, I party so hard.
translation.ja: パーティーは好きか？ すごく好き

translation.en: -Clear. -[high-pitched] Aww!
Shred the gnar!
Who dreams of driving a garbage truck?
Don't judge. At least it's original.
It's not like, "Oh my God, I didn't study for the test. Where's my pants?"
translation.ja: テストの夢は ありふれてる

translation.en: Or, uh, "Hey, I'm ridin' a giant goose, eh?"
translation.ja: 巨大なガチョウに乗る夢も

translation.en: I've never heard of the giant goose one before.
Most popular dream in Canada, kid. Look it up.
Green. [snarls]
-[gasps] Flip! -[bells ringing]

[Flip] Yeah.
I was just makin' sure no one's in there.
Well, you know, it's the gateway to the Sea of Nightmares, so… [chuckles]
translation.ja: あれが悪夢の海に つながるドアだ

translation.en: Pearls are in here somewhere. All right.
translation.ja: 真珠も あの先にある

translation.en: Okay.
Ready?
-[Nemo takes a deep breath] -Here we go, partner.
-I don't wanna go first. -It's okay.
-But I'm scared. -[Flip] It's an initiation, so…
translation.ja: 先に行くのは怖い 一種の儀式だ

translation.en: It's cold.
[Flip] That's a whole lot of water.
Okay. [clears throat]
Gonna go for a little swim. No big deal.
I know who you are.
I found out in the Waking World.
Why the hell didn't you tell me?
Wait. Do I still have my hair?
Yeah. Just not as much.
translation.ja: あるよ　少ないけど

translation.en: Let me guess. I'm a famous outlaw, yeah? Men fear me? Ladies love me?
translation.ja: 現の俺は 男に恐れられ 女にホレられる無法者だろ？

translation.en: You're a doorknob salesman.
What'd you call me?
You're my dad's brother, Philip.
You and my dad came to Slumberland every night when you were kids. And then, he left.
translation.ja: パパが夢の中で 冒険するのをやめて…

translation.en: Oh, wow.
After that, Philip stopped dreaming, and you couldn't wake up.
translation.ja: あなたは夢に取り残された

translation.en: I remember.
But when you get your Pearl, you can wake up, and you can be one person again.
translation.ja: 真珠があれば 目を覚まし 元の体に戻れる

translation.en: This is a buzzkill. I'm gonna get us both killed for that guy?
translation.ja: クソ　そいつのために 命を懸けるのか？

translation.en: We're so close, and he needs you.
translation.ja: 叔父さんには あなたが必要

translation.en: Well, I don't need him, all right? I got everything that I want right here.
translation.ja: 知るか 必要な物は ここにある

translation.en: Wine, women, waffles. The three dubs.
translation.ja: ワイン 女 ワッフル

translation.en: Not necessarily in that order.
I'm not a knob seller. I'm a flippin' outlaw!
translation.ja: 俺がセールスマンだと？ 俺は無法者だ

translation.en: But I thought that when we get our Pearls,
I could be with my dad at night, and during the day, I could be with you. You could be like my part-time dad.
translation.ja: 夜はパパ 昼はパパ代わりの あなたと過ごせる

translation.en: I am nobody's dad, kid.
So you're just giving up?
I'll tell you what I'm gonna do. I'm gonna go find a dream with a bar in it, and then I'm gonna drink until I forget who I am again.
translation.ja: バーが出てくる夢を探して 記憶を失うまで飲む

translation.en: Then I'm gonna go find someone's ex. 'Cause there's a lot of them around here.
translation.ja: それから元カノを捜す

translation.en: But I… I did the Double-Knock.
So did I, kid.
The night your dad left, I begged him to stay.
translation.ja: オヤジさんに “残ってくれ”と頼んだ

translation.en: I'll go without you.
I'll see my dad again, and I don't care if I never wake up.
translation.ja: 目覚めなくてもいい パパに会いたい

translation.en: Hey, no. You can't. It's too dangerous to go in alone.
translation.ja: よせ　１人で行くなんて 危険すぎる

translation.en: You can't tell me what to do… 'cause you're not my dad.
translation.ja: 命令しないで 私のパパじゃない

translation.en: I never shoulda brought you.
Just go back to where you belong. Otherwise, you're gonna end up like me.
translation.ja: もう戻れ でなきゃ俺みたいになる

translation.en: Nemo.
[in a woman's voice] Nemo. Wake up.
Wake up!
-[Nemo gasps, shudders] -[Arya] Nemo?
Get your things.
We're calling your uncle.
[Arya] It's not just the lying, Nemo.
translation.ja: ウソをつき⸺ 教室を抜け出した

translation.en: It's sneaking off like that. No one knew where you were.
translation.ja: 教室を抜け出した 危ない目に遭ってないかと 心配したのよ

translation.en: For all we knew, you could've been in terrible danger.
translation.ja: 危ない目に遭ってないかと 心配したのよ

translation.en: Yeah.
Why would you do that?
You wouldn't understand.
Why don't you try me?
Okay.
Well, m-- Maybe it would help if, uh… if you went first. Philip?
translation.ja: あなたから始めて フィリップ

translation.en: Would you like to tell Nemo how you're feeling?
translation.ja: ニモに気持ちを伝えて

translation.en: I don't know what you want me to say. I don't do feelings.
Everyone does feelings, whether you like it or not.
You two are in the same boat. You just don't realize it.
translation.ja: ２人とも 同じ問題を抱えてる

translation.en: Guys, come on. You're both struggling with powerful emotions, and you just… you just need to deal with them.
translation.ja: 心の底に渦巻く強い感情と 向き合わなきゃダメ

translation.en: Do we, though?
Um, everybody always says that, but… I'm not convinced.
translation.ja: みんな そう言うけど⸺ 僕は感情を無視して 平穏に生きてきた

translation.en: I-- I-- I've [scoffs] I've never dealt with my feelings, and I'm fine.
translation.ja: 僕は感情を無視して 平穏に生きてきた

translation.en: I was fine.
Should've just had them send me to foster care.
You'd probably be better off.
At least foster parents know how to be parents.
translation.ja: 少なくとも里親は“親”だ

translation.en: Nemo, we should probably talk.
I don't wanna talk. You wanna get rid of me, so get rid of me.
translation.ja: 私を捨てたいなら捨てて

translation.en: [sighs] I'm not trying to get rid of you, Nemo. I'm… I'm trying to help you.
translation.ja: 捨てたいんじゃない 助けたいんだ

translation.en: You're as bad as he is.
What? Who?
You only care about yourself.
Are you kidding? I have done nothing but take care of you.
translation.ja: 何だって？ 君の世話をしてきただろ

translation.en: I-- I-- I cook. I-- I entertain.
translation.ja: 料理して 楽しませた

translation.en: I try. And what do I get in return? You just lie to my face.
translation.ja: 努力したのにウソをつかれた

translation.en: I think we're bonding, and I let you borrow my precious lockpicks so--
translation.ja: 絆を感じたからこそ 鍵開け道具も貸して…

translation.en: Nobody cares about door stuff, okay? Why do you think you have no friends?
translation.ja: 錠前の話ばっかりだね だから叔父さんは 独りなんだよ

translation.en: Why do you think you live alone?
translation.ja: だから叔父さんは 独りなんだよ

translation.en: You should go to your room!
Where do you think I'm going? You're not my dad!
translation.ja: 行くよ パパじゃないくせに！

translation.en: Hey, I'm not trying to be!
I live alone because I like it that way!
translation.ja: 僕は独りが好きなんだ

translation.en: I didn't ask for any of this to happen. I didn't ask you to come live here!
translation.ja: 君に来てくれと頼んでない

translation.en: But I'm glad you did.
Pig, we're goin' home.
[Philip] Nemo?
No, I don't know. I don't--
Carla, I don't know. I just woke up, and she wasn't here.
translation.ja: そうだ　カーラ 起きたら消えてた

translation.en: Well, I have no idea where she would go.
Right.
Pig!
[Flip] Oh! The End of the Line! -It's party time! -[neon sign buzzing]
translation.ja: バーがあったぞ パーティー･タイムだ

translation.en: Yeah, baby! Oh!
Number one! Top of Slumberland, baby!
translation.ja: スランバーランドで１位だ

translation.en: You see that?
Hope they catch the bastard.
[Flip] Oh, yeah. Guy seems like a real bad egg. You know? Pee-yew.
translation.ja: ああ　すごく 悪いヤツみたいだな

translation.en: He took a little girl to the Sea of Nightmares, and then he ditched her, and she went in alone.
translation.ja: 女の子を１人で 悪夢の海に入らせやがった

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
Hey, you're…
A shiny pink diamond? -Yeah. Pretty, isn't it? Hi-yah! -That's nice.
translation.ja: このピンクのダイヤ きれいだろ？

translation.en: [Nemo, echoing] Come on, Pig. Grab one, and let's go.
Flip?
[Nemo] Flip!
[Flip] I got ya. Oh!
Get in the cab!
You came back for me!
Yeah. Outlaw Code. Never leave your partner behind.
translation.ja: 無法者の掟だ 相棒は決して見捨てない

translation.en: -Even if she is a pain in the… -Applesauce.
translation.ja: 無法者の掟だ 相棒は決して見捨てない 絆だね

translation.en: Applesauce! [laughs]
Oh! I got a Pearl.
Oh! Aces!
So long, suckers!
translation.ja: じゃあな クズども

translation.en: Oh, hey! Hey, guys!
-[Pig squeals] -[screaming] Nightmare!
[laughing] Whoo!
We have to get to the lighthouse! Green said it's my safe place!
I know!
Don't look down!
-Pull up! -I am!
-[Nemo screaming] -Oh my! Oh my!
-[grunting] -[Nemo whimpers] No! Drive the plane!
-Flip, come on. Flip! -[Pig oinks]
[Canadian] Aw, jeez. What a gong show.
Okay, one minute, you think you're going out for a rip…
Oh. Hey, sorry, guy.
And the next thing you know, you're goin' for a dip.
There he is.
-[Canadian whimpering] -Get in here!
Come on. Hey, Emmett, you party?
translation.ja: エメット　パーティーは？

translation.en: I party.
Come here! Get in here!
[in Southern accent] Hey, Emmett, take a right.
Here we go.
-I can't. I can't. What's that? -Come here, buddy.
Hit it, Emmett!
Help! Oh, my hair! My hair!
translation.ja: 助けてくれ　僕の髪が！

translation.en: [in Spanish] I knew you'd return! I smelled your musk.
translation.ja: 〈やはり あなたね ニオイで分かった〉

translation.en: Uh, sí, sí, sí. Pero no.
translation.ja: シー･シー･シー　ノー･ノー

translation.en: Pero no.
-[Canadian gasps] -[announcer on TV] Now, McRoy to center. There's O'Reilly… Great pass to Johnson, and a goal!
translation.ja: マクロイがセンターへ運び ジョセフがゴール！

translation.en: -He scores! -Yes! Let's go! Let's go!
-[motor whirring] -[wind whipping] -[wistful piano music playing] -[thunder rumbling]
[sighs] We're gonna make it, kid.
Come on. I see the lighthouse.
Come on, kid. We're almost there. You can finally make your wish.
translation.ja: やっと願いが かなうぞ

translation.en: [gasps] What's wrong?
[weakly] Oh… I don't feel so good.
[Flip] Nemo!
[Carla] Hey, slow down! Slow down!
Pig.
[Flip] What's wrong?
[weakly] Something's not right.
I'm gonna get you home. You'll be safe at home.
translation.ja: 家に運んでやる あそこは安全だ

translation.en: There!
There!
Wait, the Pearl. I dropped the Pearl. We have to go back.
translation.ja: 真珠を落とした　拾わなきゃ

translation.en: You get to the lighthouse. I'll get the Pearl, okay? Go.
translation.ja: 灯台へ行け　俺は真珠を

translation.en: Wait. No, not without you!
-[Flip grunting] -[Nemo] Flip!
Flip!
-[Flip yelling and grunting] -[Nemo] Flip!
[Flip groaning] Nemo!
[Flip, echoing] Nemo, go! Get to the lighthouse! Say hi to your dad for me.
translation.ja: ニモ　灯台へ行け オヤジさんによろしく

translation.en: Flip? Wake up.
[Carla] Philip!
What are you doing?
[Carla] No! Get down! Philip! Philip!
translation.ja: ダメよ　座って フィリップ　ねえ！

translation.en: [Carla] No!
Let's go home.
Well, this is gonna be a buttload of paperwork.
translation.ja: 報告書を山ほど書かなくちゃ

translation.en: So Nemo, how do you feel? Different?
translation.ja: ねえ ニモ 気分はどう？　前と違う？

translation.en: Big journey, all by yourself.
I see you've found yourself a Pearl. Guess it's not a myth after all.
translation.ja: 真珠を見つけた？ 伝説じゃなかったのね

translation.en: I didn't get my dad back.
You had to give up your dream. I guess you found something more important.
translation.ja: 夢をあきらめたのね もっと大切な何かのために

translation.en: Right, better get to work, then.
-[Pig snorting] -[Green] Oh, uh… [sighs]
You've got a good pig there.
Give it a squeeze for me.
-[Pig grunts] -[Green] Told you.
You have the dream you're meant to have. We make sure of that.
translation.ja: 見るべき夢を 私たちは手配する

translation.en: What you do next…? Well, that's up to you.
translation.ja: 今後の展開は あなた次第

translation.en: Ugh! Seriously? Look at this mess!
translation.ja: なんで こんなに汚いの？

translation.en: Can I get a cleaning crew in here pronto? Come on!
translation.ja: 今すぐ掃除係を 送ってちょうだい

translation.en: [crying] I missed you so much.
I miss you.
Race you to the top?
Help!
-Nemo! She's not breathing. -[Carla] Okay.
We got her! We got her. It's okay. Okay.
translation.ja: 私たちに任せて　大丈夫よ

translation.en: Did you ever figure it out? What the lighthouse is for?
translation.ja: 灯台の役割は分かったか？

translation.en: -[Pig oinking] -It's not to keep ships safe.
No. If we wanted to do that, we'd never let 'em leave harbor, would we?
translation.ja: 守りたいなら 港から出さなければいい

translation.en: [Carla] Nothing. Okay. One, two, three, four, five, six.
-Come on, Nemo! -[Carla] Seven, eight, nine.
-[Philip] Breathe! -[Carla] Come on. Oh.
To guide you on your journey.
That's right.
So you can see things that the lighthouse keeper can only dream of.
translation.ja: 道しるべを頼りに 人生という旅を楽しめ

translation.en: I didn't teach you all those things so you could live on an island.
translation.ja: お前には羽ばたいてほしい

translation.en: I did it so that you could know…
you can do anything.
[Carla] Okay, come on, Nemo.
One, two, three…
I didn't think I could go on without you.
You traveled to the Sea of Nightmares and came back home safe again.
translation.ja: 悪夢の海まで行き⸺ 無事 帰ってきた

translation.en: After that, I don't think the Waking World's gonna be too difficult.
translation.ja: 現の世界くらい へっちゃらさ

translation.en: But that's up to you.
Life is waiting for you, Nemo.
It would be a shame to miss that.
[crying] I have to go back.
That's my girl.
[takes a deep breath] And you never forget…
how very proud I am of you.
And keep an eye on that brother of mine.
He seems normal, but he's not.
translation.ja: 普通っぽく見えるが実は⸺

translation.en: Deep down, he's a wild man.
Bye, Dad.
[Carla] Okay, let's go! Come on, get her over!
translation.ja: よかった　体を横に向けて

translation.en: There we go! Good girl, Nemo!
translation.ja: よく頑張ったわね　ニモ

translation.en: -[laughing] Good girl! -[Philip sobbing]
[Carla] Good girl.
You're okay. You're okay.
I got you. And I'm not gonna let go of you ever, okay?
translation.ja: 俺がついてるぞ 二度と離さない

translation.en: Flip?
[softly] Yeah. [mimics Flip] It's Flip.
And Philip. Philip and Flip.
Flilip? [high-pitched snicker]
-[Undeadheads groan] -[Nemo] Bye, Jamal. See you tomorrow.
translation.ja: ジャマール　明日ね

translation.en: You know, not a lot of people know this, but I'm actually a master pickpocket.
translation.ja: 俺って実は 天才的なスリなんだ

translation.en: Oh, come on. No, you're not. [chuckles]
-Oh my G-- -You have very smooth wrists.
[Arya] Wait. What? How did you…?
I'm gonna take you sailing.
Maybe next time you can come with us.
Yeah, I'd love to. [chuckles]
Aces.
Oh. Oh, wait. I need my watch back.
No. No, seriously. Can I get my watch back?
translation.ja: ねえ　返してってば

translation.en: [quietly] Call me.
Oh, great. You're already dressed for bed.
translation.ja: もう寝る支度を済ませたのか

translation.en: [Nemo] Well, I don't like to be late.
So, what's the plan tonight?
I don't know. I think I might just wander and see what happens.
translation.ja: 気の向くまま 歩いてみようかな

translation.en: Sounds good.
-Night-night, kiddo. I love you. -I love you too.
-I'll try to be on time. -[Nemo giggles]
Sweet dreams.
